sentences.sentence: He took it back to his desk in the scriptorium and began to read it.
sentences.translation: 他把它带回他在缮写室的书桌并开始阅读。

sentences.sentence: Use the corridors to link the Gambling Den and the Scriptorium to the Ritual Chamber.
sentences.translation: 用赌场图板和魔法书屋图板的走廊与仪式大厅图板相连接。

sentences.sentence: Expand your exploration of the dungeons of Cadwallon with two new rooms: the Gambling Den and the Scriptorium!
sentences.translation: 新增加了两个玩家可以探索的Cadwallon的地下城房间：赌场和魔法书屋！
